Chapter Previous

class gstInertiaEffect : public gstEffect

Inertia effect for PHANToM. This effect simulates inertia at the endpoint of a PHANToM as if a mass were attached there, using a spring/damper model. The mass, spring constant, and damping coefficient can be specified.

From header file: gstInertiaEffect.h

Constructors and Destructors

~gstInertiaEffectDestructor.

getGravity Get Gravity in Meters/Sec^2.

setMass Set mass [kilograms].
setSpringStiffness Set spring constant (stiffness) [Kg/(1000.
